summary: Provides backend services for creating, retrieving, updating and deleting evaluation records and their associated scenarios, handling both automated and human-driven evaluations. Includes utilities for preparing CSV data, removing duplicate scenarios, comparing evaluation outcomes, and fetching evaluation results from the database.
business_intent: Enable the application to manage evaluation workflows for AI agents, allowing users to define evaluation scenarios, store human feedback, run automated assessments, and access the results for analysis and reporting.
